title: [Self-Directed] The Role of Instructional Designers in Distance Education: Applying Chaos and Complex Systems Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science education and remote education management experience
context.additional_context: Science education course for elementary teachers, conducting project-based assessments in smartphone-based limited technological environments

learning_goals: Apply core concepts of chaos and complex systems theory to remote education design
Plan flexible instructional designs for unpredictable learning environments
Develop three interaction strategies for small learner groups
Complete a project utilizing smartphone-based assessment tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
